MenuElement.Text: if ( (from CountOpenDatabaseItems select OpenNonCompliance) > 0 ) then ( translate("#LDS#Heading Pending Rule Violations") + ' (' + from CountOpenDatabaseItems select OpenNonCompliance + ')' ) else translate("#LDS#Heading Pending Rule Violations")
MenuElement.Condition: IsNull(GetConfigParm("QER\ComplianceCheck"), "0") = "1" and exists("personinaerole", sqland( sqlcompareuid("uid_person", getuser()), "uid_aerole in ( select uid_parentaerole from aerolecollection where uid_aerole in (select uid_orgruler from compliancerule ))" ))
